The region benefits from excellent accessibility via the AP-7 motorway, linking seamlessly to Alicante International Airport (90 minutes) and Valencia (120 minutes). Calpe's landscape combines pristine beaches with charming old town quarters, creating an environment where modern amenities coexist harmoniously with authentic Mediterranean character. The town has evolved strategically, maintaining its appeal to luxury market segments while preserving environmental integrity and architectural standards that distinguish it from over-developed coastal alternatives.

International residents appreciate the established medical infrastructure, with many healthcare providers accustomed to treating expatriate communities and offering multilingual consultations. Prescription medications are readily available through pharmacies throughout the town, and medical insurance providers covering international residents maintain strong networks within the region.
